batchPaymentMSMT(uint16,address[],addres.details: Performs a batch of `transferFrom` operations on multiple ERC20 tokens from multiple senders to multiple recipients.      The caller must have approved this contract to spend the specified amounts on their behalf.      NOTE: Only the contract owner can call this function due to security reasons. So, the contract owner (caller)      shall just pay the gas but the contract is the spender as it is calling the transferFrom function.

params.amounts: An array of token amounts to be transferred to each recipient.
params.froms: An array of addresses from which the tokens will be transferred.
params.tokens: An array of ERC20 tokens to be transferred.
params.tos: An array of addresses to which the tokens will be transferred.

batchPaymentSSMT(uint16,address,address[.details: Performs a batch of `transferFrom` operations from a single sender to multiple recipients on multiple tokens.      The contract must have prior approval from the sender to transfer the specified amounts on their behalf.      NOTE: Only the contract owner can call this function due to security reasons. So, the contract owner (caller)      shall just pay the gas but the contract is the spender as it is calling the transferFrom function.

params.amounts: An array of token amounts to be transferred to each recipient.
params.from: The address from which the tokens will be transferred.
params.tokens: An array of ERC20 tokens to be transferred.
params.tos: An array of addresses to which the tokens will be transferred.

batchPaymentSSPermit(uint16,address,((ad.details: Performs a `permitTransferFrom` operation from a single sender to single recipient on single token.      Sender must have already approved the `Permit2` contract.      • Yes -> then just signature needed,      • No -> has to arrange gas tokens for the approval ..from somewhere. » And then provide signature.      When asking for signature, BundlePay (this) contract shall be used as spender.

params.permit: The permit signed by Sender to send amount(s) & fees. That's why used PermitBatch.... Please note that      this function can also handle bulk payments by a single sender. So, need to sign it accordingly.
params.transferDetails: array of transfer details including fees.

batchPaymentSSST(uint16,address,address,.details: Performs a batch of `transferFrom` operations from a single sender to multiple recipients on single token.      The contract must have prior approval from the sender to transfer the specified amounts on their behalf.      NOTE: Only the contract owner can call this function due to security reasons. So, the contract owner (caller)      shall just pay the gas but the contract is the spender as it is calling the transferFrom function.

params.amounts: An array of token amounts to be transferred to each recipient.
params.from: The address from which the tokens will be transferred.
params.token: The ERC20 token to be transferred.
params.tos: An array of addresses to which the tokens will be transferred.

params.callerRelayerIndex: The index of the caller relayer.
params.relayer: The address of the relayer to be set.
params.relayerIndex: The index of the relayer to be set.

params._relayers: The addresses of the relayers to be set.
params.callerRelayerIndex: The index of the caller relayer.
params.relayerIndices: The indices of the relayers to be set.

singlePaymentSSSTSR(uint16,address,addre.details: Performs a `transferFrom` operation from a single sender to single recipient on single token.      The contract must have prior approval from the sender to transfer the specified amounts on their behalf.      NOTE: Only the contract owner can call this function due to security reasons. So, the contract owner (caller)      shall just pay the gas but the contract is the spender as it is calling the transferFrom function.      NOTE: Unlike `batchPaymentSSSTMR`, for-loop is avoided resulting into lesser gas.

params.amount: The token amount to be transferred to each recipient.
params.from: The address from which the tokens will be transferred.
params.to: The address to which the tokens will be transferred.
params.token: The ERC20 token to be transferred.

batchPaymentSSPermit(uint16,address,((ad.notice: Batch Payment by Single Sender to one or more Recipients using Permit2 "Signature Transfer" approach.         Can also handle payment with separate tokens for each recipient.

singlePaymentSSSTSR(uint16,address,addre.notice: Single Sender Single Token Single Recipient (SSSTSR)
